abilities.description: You are accustomed to a life at sea. When you set sail after a landlocked layover, take +2 momentum or +2 spirit, or +1 of each. When you make landfall, @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} (-1).

When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} to plot a course through careful study of currents and weather, or if you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} aboard ship to overcome or avoid an environmental hazard such as a storm or rogue wave, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you make a move to hunt, oppose, study, pacify, or gain the favor of a sea creature, add +1. On a strong hit with a match, envision the surprising insight or affinity you gain; mark 1 tick on your discoveries or bonds legacy track.
